Description: Fragment of oval handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora at neck join. Clay fine light orange-brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp with Helios head symbol.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 80, 43 Name Agloumbrotos. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0038.19.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0837)
